intro.description: This tutorial helps you create a grouped listing using MyEclipse Reports.

item.title: Create a Report
item.description: Select the New Report action from the toolbar or click the "Click to Perform" link below.

item.title: Create a DataSource
item.description: Open the Data Explorer View. Right click on Data Sources and choose "New Data Source"

item.title: Create a DataSet
item.description: Open the Data Explorer View. Right click on Data Sets and choose "New Data Set"

item.title: Bind the data to the table
item.description: Drag the fields you need in the table from the DataSet in the Data Explorer view to the table in the editor area

item.title: Edit the group
item.description: Select the listing table, right click and choose "Edit Group".
